Professional Awards.title: Spot Award: Database Queries Optimization
Professional Awards.description: The AuditLog table, designed to track changes and activities in the application, contained approximately 1 billion records. Initially, some queries in the application against this table were notably inefficient, with response times averaging around 2 minutes, which were making all the UI pages using audit-log functionality quite slow. After a thorough analysis of the architecture, queries, and data, I was able to optimize the process. By re-writing the queries and reorganizing the data which eventually helped in obtaining optimized query plan, I successfully reduced the response time to under couple of seconds with most of them under a second.
highlights: Initial average response time was 2 minutes. The final response time was 1 second to couple of seconds.
The table contained a billion records.

Professional Awards.title: Spot Award: BigMachines Site Letter
Professional Awards.description: I successfully completed site letter changes and covered a lot of edge cases as part of the implementation. This thorough work was well appreciated and recognized by the customer for completing this critical functionality on time for the October release.

Professional Awards.title: Spot Award: Ciam Migration Tool
Professional Awards.description: Played a pivotal role in designing and developing a CIAM migration tool from scratch that migrates customers to CIAM (Customer Identity and Access Management) during off-hours, in a well-planned and structured manner with a high degree of transparency.

Professional Awards.title: Spot Awad: CUAS - CIAM (Auth0) integration
Professional Awards.description: Led the integration of Auth0 into a legacy application with an AngularJS frontend and a Groovy on Grails backend. Despite the lack of native support for these technologies from Auth0, I developed a robust solution native to the code for integrating Auth0 in the application. Managed the entire process from architectural design to implementation single-handedly.
highlights: Designed and implemented the architecture for integrating Auth0, overcoming the challenge of the absence of native libraries for AngularJS and Groovy on Grails.

Professional Certifications.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
Professional Certifications.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practioner - This certification validates foundational understanding on AWS cloud concepts, services and terminology. This certification demonstrate my knowledge of AWS's core services, cloud economics, billing, pricing models, and best security practices. Provides ability to effectively communicate cloud solutions and participate in cloud-relate projects. Highlights my commitment to cloud proficiency and my readiness to leverage AWS Services in various roles.

Professional Certifications.title: AWS Certified Developer Associate
Professional Certifications.description: AWS Certified Developer Associate - This certification validates technical expertise in developing and maintaining applications on the AWS Platform. It covers core AWS Services and proficiency in developing, deploying and debugging applications on cloud including serverless applications.

Academic Awards.data: Qualified for the National Mathematical Olympiad (NMO) after advancing through the Pre-Regional and Regional Mathematical Olympiads. This accomplishment granted a standard 5% reduction in the minimum percentage required for admission in IIITs
Awarded with SILVER Medal in Regional Level TAEK-WON-DO Championship held at JNV Chandigarh
Awarded with Academic Excellence Award in XI
